item.title: By: Hoops
item.dc:creator: Hoops
item.description:
Doug and I area also keeping mum about the names on our short list for this same exact reason.
I did have this fleeting thought about what would happen if you two had a boy and chose our #1 boy name. I suppose we'd have 3 months to recover...
For now, we just call him Cleatus the Fetus.
We told Doug's mom his name was Cleatus and she flipped out, "Just remember he has to live with that name FOR THE TEST OF HIS LIFE!" Us: "Uh, it's a JOKE."
item.content:encoded:
Doug and I area also keeping mum about the names on our short list for this same exact reason.

I did have this fleeting thought about what would happen if you two had a boy and chose our #1 boy name. I suppose we’d have 3 months to recover…

For now, we just call him Cleatus the Fetus.

We told Doug’s mom his name was Cleatus and she flipped out, “Just remember he has to live with that name FOR THE TEST OF HIS LIFE!” Us: “Uh, it’s a JOKE.”
